unnormalised: Interesting moves this transfer window. Mohun Bagan securing Liston Colaco for a reported Rs. 2 Crore is a significant investment. Hopefully, he'll deliver goals like Shah Rukh Khan delivers blockbusters, a la DDLJ! East Bengal needs to bolster their squad to compete. Will Chennaiyin FC find a gem from the I-League like Aizawl FC did in 2017? Looking forward to seeing how these signings impact the Durand Cup. It's all about performance now. Good luck!
normalised: Interesting moves this transfer window. Mohun Bagan securing Liston Colaco for a reported rupee two crore is a significant investment. Hopefully, he will deliver goals like Shah Rukh Khan delivers blockbusters, a la D D L J! East Bengal needs to bolster their squad to compete. Will Chennaiyin F C find a gem from the I-League like Aizawl F C did in two thousand and seventeen? Looking forward to seeing how these signings impact the Durand Cup. It is all about performance now. Good luck!
